##Inundation period
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

hobo = read.csv("C:\\Users\\juliena\\Desktop\\Data\\HOBO data\\CSV files\\hobo.csv", as.is = T)

#convert Period to numeric
hobo$xxx = sapply(strsplit(hobo$Period,":"),
  function(x) {
    x <- as.numeric(x)
    x[1]+x[2]/60
    }
)

hobo_lm = lm(xxx ~ MHW + CharlestonHeight + Salinity, data = hobo)
summary(hobo_lm)
plot(xxx ~ MHW, data = hobo)

p = ggplot(hobo, aes(CharlestonHeight, xxx))
p + geom_point(aes(colour = factor(HOBO_ID))) + 
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', formula = y ~ x)

```
